meanings.definition: Relating to the examination of tissues for the presence of disease.
meanings.sent1: The histopathologic analysis revealed the presence of cancer cells in the tissue sample.
meanings.sent2: The doctor ordered a histopathologic examination to determine the cause of the abnormal growth.
meanings.sent3: The histopathologic report was so detailed, it felt like reading a mystery novel about cells.
meanings.sent4: Her histopathologic skills were like a detective's, uncovering hidden clues within the tissue.
meanings.sent5: The histopathologic investigation painted a clear picture of the disease lurking within.

meanings.definition: The study of changes in tissues caused by disease.
meanings.sent1: She decided to pursue a career in histopathologic to understand diseases better.
meanings.sent2: The histopathologic of the tissue samples revealed significant changes due to the illness.
meanings.sent3: In the world of tissues, histopathologic was the detective solving the mysteries of diseases.
meanings.sent4: The histopathologic of the cells was like a time machine, showing the past effects of diseases.
meanings.sent5: His passion for histopathologic stemmed from a desire to unravel the secrets hidden in tissues.
